    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String OWNER_APPLICATION
      Value that can be used in the owner definition to reference the owner of the application associated with this template.
      static java.lang.String OWNER_PARENT
      Value that can be used in the owner definition to reference the owner of the object containing this template (role or application).
      static java.lang.String OWNER_ROLE
      Value that can be used in the owner definition to reference the owner of the role containing this template.

      • OWNER_PARENT

        public static final java.lang.String OWNER_PARENT

      • OWNER_ROLE

        public static final java.lang.String OWNER_ROLE
        Value that can be used in the owner definition to reference the owner of the role containing this template. This is what the template editor currently sets.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OWNER_APPLICATION

        public static final java.lang.String OWNER_APPLICATION
        Value that can be used in the owner definition to reference the owner of the application associated with this template.
